text: In a single thread group add multiple Http client and for each request add a seperate CSV data config, it throws error while reading the CSV file StringIndexOutofBound exception and in the 'View result tree' doesn't show anything.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Please attach the log file with the exact error message.

Also, it would help if you can attach the simplest test case that causes the problem. Redact any private info - or use dummy samplers - before attaching.
It works by giving the absolute path of the CSV file for multiple CSV data config component.
